sourcesContent:
import './regionbasket.css' import img from './../../img/previews/Apple BYZ S852I.svg' import imgIncrement from './../../img/icons/increment.svg' import imgDecrement from './../../img/icons/decrement.svg' import imgDelete from './../../img/icons/delete.svg' import Count from '../count/Count' import ButtonDelete from '../buttonDelete/ButtonDelete' //60. const RegionBasketCards = ({product, deleteProduct, increment, decrement}) =>{ return(
< Count count={product.count} increment={increment} id={product.id}/>
< ButtonDelete deleteProduct={deleteProduct} id={product.id} />
{product.title}
{product.price}
{product.priceTotal}
) } export default RegionBasketCards;
